text: Is there a way to edit the html for Meetings pages? For example, I want to change the logo on a specific meeting but unsure of where to access the file directly.:
I think I've talked to someone about this in the past, but currently I believe there is no way to modify any of this

Is there any way to setup default content for a repeater in a module, that is a local module? My client would like to have 5 items as a default in a repeater, but each page may have one or two items that are changed -- Is this possible if it isn't a global module, to setup that much content as default?
You can set it up once added to a template
right, but if just adding the module to the page, I don't hae that type of depth for default options, correct?
You can do it by editing the module JSON file. I do it all the time for the same reason
If it's a complex module, I'll clone it, make it global, edit the contents in the IDE. Then paste the defaults in into the fields.json of the non global one. <@U25PYL3Q8>
nope. it would have to be attached to the template BEFORE hand
